div.h1: Welcome to Northport Schools! Home of the Mustangs

span.p: Hello to all! WE MISS YOU! About 180 lunches and breakfasts go out everyday. We are glad we can still serve you, but we miss seeing your faces in classrooms, cafeteria, gym, hallways, and playground. Please let us know if you need anything. Take care of yourselves!

p.strong: NONDISCRIMINATION Information for Northport School District No. 211

p.span: Northport School District 211 does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following employee has been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Don Baribault, Superintendent at P.O. Box 1280, Northport, WA 99157. Telephone: 509-732-4430. Email:dbaribault@northportschools.org
